mapper.select: SELECT m1.memberIdx, m1.id, m1.pwd, m1.name, m2.birth, m1.nickName, m2.email1, m2.email2, m2.tel1, m2.tel2, m2.tel3, m2.addr1,m2.addr2, m2.gender,m1.category1,m1.category2,m1.category3,m2.age FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberIdx = m2.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN memberauthority ma ON m1.memberIdx = ma.memberIdx WHERE m1.id = #{id}
